name: map0
body: |- wb(wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), emptycls), wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wceq(co(c0, cmap, c1), emptycls), wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wne(c1, emptycls))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

comment: Set exponentiation is empty iff the base is empty and the exponent is not empty. Theorem 97 of [Suppes] p. 89. (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2003.)
